description: [Status: preview] [Name: suspicious-ftplib-import] [Message: ftplib and related modules are considered insecure. Use SSH, SFTP, SCP, or another encrypted protocol.] What it does Checks for imports of the ftplib module. Why is this bad? FTP is considered insecure. Instead, use SSH, SFTP, SCP, or another encrypted protocol. Example import ftplib
